amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the Act from taking effect until $20 Million in federal funds given to Alaska for transportation purposes in King Cove is repaid to the Federal Government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 260 (Roll no. 405).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 260 (Roll no. 405).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
